text: Bernadette Isaac-Sibille (30 March 1930 â€“ 2 January 2021) was a French politician. She was born in Lyon, France. She was a member of the Union for French Democracy. She was Mayor of Lyon from 1983 to 1989. Isaac-Sibille was a member of the National Assembly from 1988 to 2002. Isaac-Sibille died on 2 January 2021, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Lyon
title: Bernadette Isaac-Sibille
